title: linz
author: linz
content: i found bitcoinpos coin that clone from vbitcoin.first 1000 block mine by pow and later blocks are pos.i want to know is there any other pos clone from bitcoin

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: Apparently there was a bitcoin stake at some point when the 2017 fork contest was going on (I think the contest was to see who could make the most annoying amount of noise ).The issue with these forks is they don't get much interest or volume for long. Why make another Dash when it's already a thing. There's probably been other and there will probably be far more then we'll ever need made after the next hard fork too.

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: Quotei want to know is there any other pos clone from bitcoinWhat you are describing is not a 'clone'. There is no such thing as a 'clone of Bitcoin'. All the other coins are altcoins that either initially forked from BTC or more often than not were created by someone looking to cash in on the crypto craze by creating yet another crapcoin, pre-mining the shit out of it and then hoping it get listed on exchanges so they can cash out.

comments.author: takuma sato
comments.body: Well you have Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC) which is basically a Bitcoin clone on the Ethereum blockchain which is now PoS. Of course, big quotation marks between "Bitcoin clone". No such thing.
